Name: Eternal Samurai
About the game: Eternal Samurai is a retro-inspired side-scroller. You play as the spirit of a samurai that is killed, and seeks revenge by possessing his killer to continue his quest. - Simple slash/deflect combat - 10 Levels - Secret/Multiple Paths - Power-ups - Possess your killers! - No death penalty - NES colour palette NEW - Local multiplayer - Duel Mode
